title: Bug 18705: Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The issue involves excessive flashing in the Control Example, and the cause is unclear.
OB: When running the control example, resize the window in the vertical direction only. It is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash excessively.
EB: After resizing the window in the vertical direction in the control example, the flashing of tabs in the TabFolder and frames should be minimized or eliminated.
SR: Investigate and address the root cause of the flashing issue in the Control Example when resizing the window vertically. Ensure a smoother user experience by minimizing or eliminating the observed flashing.
